articles.title: Georgia Tech 27-20 Colorado (Aug 29, 2025) Game Recap - ESPN
articles.description: Expert recap and game analysis of the Georgia Tech Yellow Jackets vs. Colorado Buffaloes NCAAF game from August 29, 2025 on ESPN.
articles.content:
BOULDER, Colo. -- Haynes King faked a pitch and scampered for a 45-yard touchdown with 1:07 remaining as Georgia Tech overcame a turnover-filled start to beat Colorado 27-20 on Friday night.

articles.author: Samuel Axon
articles.title: With new in-house models, Microsoft lays the groundwork for independence from OpenAI - Ars Technica
articles.description: Microsoft is still deeply tied to OpenAI, but who knows what the future holds.
